name: Life in a Bottle (JKClayton)
description:
This is a project created by Team 1 of the Miami University Game Design Club (Jackson Clayton, Yagace, Cosmelon (Charlie), d3m3, Dylan Fall, Elijah Cilfone, Jackson A, Nachobear)

Play as a squid who is trying to keep his habitat in proper living condition by sealing any holes that begin to leak water.
